summary: The module implements a full-featured lexical analysis framework used by the parser. It defines abstract and concrete lexer classes, token representations, pattern handling, scanning utilities, and state management to convert raw text into a stream of typed tokens with positional information.
business_intent: Enable parsing of textual input by providing efficient tokenization based on configurable grammars, supporting context‑sensitive lexing, regular‑expression patterns, and reusable lexer threads for downstream parsing components.
